flavor: As the sun sank towards the horizon, the glittering lights of the expo remained dark. But the shanty city bloomed to life.
printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. The first time you access an agenda this turn, gain 7 credits.

printed_text: 2[credit]: Swap a piece of barrier ice currently being encountered with a piece of ice directly before or after it. The run continues from this new position. You are still encountering that ice.
stripped_printed_text: 2 credits: Swap a piece of barrier ice currently being encountered with a piece of ice directly before or after it. The run continues from this new position. You are still encountering that ice.

flavor: "First, you get a horde of zombies. Then you do whatever you want, 'cuz you have a horde of zombies." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
printed_text: [trash]: The Corp cannot rez the outermost piece of ice during a run on any server this turn.
stripped_printed_text: trash: The Corp cannot rez the outermost piece of ice during a run on any server this turn.

printed_text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.

flavor: "The secret to investing is networking." -Laramy Fisk
printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Each player draws 3 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. Each player draws 3 cards.

printed_text: [click]: Host up to 3 cards from your grip facedown on this hardware (you may look at these cards at any time). [click]: Add all hosted cards to your grip. [trash]: Add all hosted cards to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: click: Host up to 3 cards from your grip facedown on this hardware (you may look at these cards at any time). click: Add all hosted cards to your grip. trash: Add all hosted cards to your grip.

flavor: "Our life is made by the death of others." -Leonardo Da Vinci
printed_text:
Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on DaVinci.
[trash]: Install a card from your grip with an install cost equal to or less than the number of power counters on DaVinci, ignoring the install cost.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 power counter on DaVinci. trash: Install a card from your grip with an install cost equal to or less than the number of power counters on DaVinci, ignoring the install cost.

flavor: Almost a zettabyte of data flows each minute through one of the many net pavilions scattered around the expo.
printed_text: As an additional cost to take the basic action to trash 1 resource, the Corp must pay 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to take the basic action to trash 1 resource, the Corp must pay 2 credits.

flavor: The Cybernetics Court has seven floors of attractions. The plasteel used to construct it was even more expensive than the thousands of cybernetic implants displayed inside.
printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 4.
stripped_printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 4.

flavor: The SanSan Outlaws have a close relationship with Haas-Bioroid's sports engineering division, SHIFT.
printed_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install a card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may install a card from Archives or HQ, ignoring the install cost.

printed_text: For the first net damage the Runner suffers each turn, you may look at the Runner's grip and select the card that is trashed.
stripped_printed_text: For the first net damage the Runner suffers each turn, you may look at the Runner's grip and select the card that is trashed.

flavor: The more people submit their DNA and family history to the program, the more accurate it becomes.
printed_text: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner jacks out, do 1 net damage.

flavor: The Genetics Pavilion was designed by renowned architect Meru Mati II. It was built without the aid of bioroids, instead relying on human and clone labor.
printed_text: The Runner cannot draw more than 2 cards during his or her turn.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner cannot draw more than 2 cards during his or her turn.

flavor: There are over 20,000 brands represented in Franchise City, all of them owned by fewer than 100 corps.
printed_text:
While the Runner is accessing an agenda from R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses an agenda, add this asset to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is accessing an agenda from R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses an agenda, add this asset to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

printed_text:
If the Runner accesses Product Placement from R&D, he or she must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Product Placement, the Corp gains 2[credit]. Ignore this effect if Product Placement is accessed from Archives.
stripped_printed_text: If the Runner accesses Product Placement from R&D, he or she must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Product Placement, the Corp gains 2 credits. Ignore this effect if Product Placement is accessed from Archives.

flavor: The holosculpture depicts the three inhabited worlds. The square can hold almost 1% of their total population.
printed_text:
Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets.
[click]: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.
stripped_printed_text: Worlds Plaza can host up to 3 assets. click: Install an asset from HQ on Worlds Plaza and rez it, lowering its rez cost by 2, if able.

printed_text:
Place 3 power counters on Public Support when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Public Support, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Public Support.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 power counters on Public Support when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Public Support, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Public Support.

flavor: "Hello, and welcome to the Universe of Tomorrow! You could live for five-hundred years and not see all of the attractions I can tell you about."
printed_text: Tour Guide gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed asset you have.
stripped_printed_text: Tour Guide gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed asset you have.

flavor: The expo was built in the East California desert: a temporary city constructed for the advancement of humanity.
printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if there is a rezzed asset installed in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if there is a rezzed asset installed in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.

printed_text: When you score The Future is Now, search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: When you score The Future is Now, search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
